医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新计划为年轻阿尔茨海默氏症患者提供远足探险活动从今年 7 月开始，65 岁之前被诊断出患有阿尔茨海默氏症的人将有一个新的机会通过名为 SOAR 的计划与他人联系，同时探索精彩的户外活动。该名称是 Shared Outdoor Adventures for Resilience 的缩写。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/New-program-offers-hiking-adventures-for-people-with-younger-onset-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/New-program-offers-hiking-adventures-for-people-with-younger-onset-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b669cae-e0d9-4e46-afae-c3918f419d1d Fri, 07 Jul 2023 21:24:42 -0400 New program offers hiking adventures for people with younger-onset Alzheimer's
双侧全膝关节置换术可能会增加并发症的风险《骨与关节外科杂志》上的一项研究报告称，与接受单侧全膝关节置换术的匹配患者相比，接受双侧全膝关节置换术 (TKA) 的患者出现多种并发症的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Bilingual-total-knee-arthroplasty-may-increase-risk-of-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Bilingual-total-knee-arthroplasty-may-increase-risk-of-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=295ed44d-4ced-4409-839a-4b7b6e8abbc9 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 21:18:30 -0400 Bilateral total knee arthroplasty may increase risk of complications
研究揭示深度睡眠与血糖控制之间的联系机制研究人员已经知道，缺乏高质量的睡眠会增加一个人患糖尿病的风险。然而，原因仍然是个谜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Research-uncovers-mechanism-linking-deep-sleep-to-blood-sugar-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Research-uncovers-mechanism-linking-deep-sleep-to-blood-sugar-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=473a1b6a-5002-472b-860c-08781ae8db8c Fri, 07 Jul 2023 21:14:19 -0400 Research uncovers mechanism linking deep sleep to blood sugar control
研究追踪人类癌症最早阶段的自然演变斯坦福大学医学院的研究人员发现，未来的癌细胞在被识别为恶性肿瘤前的数年里，会以可预测的、连续的方式积累一系列特定的基因变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Study-traces-the-natural-evolution-of-earliest-stages-of- human-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Study-traces-the-natural-evolution-of-earliest-stages-of- human-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a1f6952-1039-4235-bf01-57546da659eb Fri, 07 Jul 2023 21:07:05 -0400 Study traces the natural evolution of earliest stages of human cancers
AML患者新型染色体异常的病例报告及综述2023 年 6 月 28 日，《Genes & Cancer》发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“A new t (5; 17) (q35; q21) related to t (8; 21) (q22; q22) in a Patient of Acute粒细胞白血病：病例报告和文献综述。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Case-report-and-review-of-a-novel-chromosomal-abnormality-in-AML-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Case-report-and-review-of-a-novel-chromosomal-abnormality-in-AML-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d385615-90f7-4ed4-9741-6cd05dd8c2d5 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 20:52:56 -0400 Case report and review of a novel chromosomal abnormality in AML patient
经济毒性是晚期前列腺癌患者的主要问题根据美国泌尿外科协会 (AUA) 官方期刊 The Journal of Urology® 8 月号的一项研究，50% 的转移性前列腺癌患者因治疗而经历一定程度的经济困难。该期刊由威科集团 (Wolters Kluwer) 的 Lippincott 作品集出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Financial-毒性-a-major-issue-for-病人-with-advanced-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Financial-毒性-a-major-issue-for-病人-with-advanced-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=913ed0f9-126b-49a9-8e74-a0f407e4fc32 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 20:48:11 -0400 Financial toxicity a major issue for patients with advanced prostate cancer
研究人员识别并描述了拟南芥芽再生的关键负调节因子植物具有完全由体细胞（即通常不参与繁殖的普通细胞）再生的独特能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Researchers-identify-and-characterize-a-key-negative-regulator-of-shoot-regenesis-in-Arabidopsis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Researchers-identify-and-characterize-a-key-negative-regulator-of-shoot-regenesis-in-Arabidopsis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2df78b3-38ba-41fe-ad55-aa38fde0442a Fri, 07 Jul 2023 20:41:36 -0400 Researchers identify and characterize a key negative regulator of shoot regeneration in Arabidopsis
研究发现卵巢癌中三种以前未知的膜蛋白日本名古屋大学领导的一项研究发现了卵巢癌中三种以前未知的膜蛋白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Study-uncovers- Three-previously-unknown-membrane- Proteins-in-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Study-uncovers- Three-previously-unknown-membrane- Proteins-in-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae068cbf-98f4-4b6d-86b5-13c8a9e5f58e Fri, 07 Jul 2023 20:37:50 -0400 Study uncovers three previously unknown membrane proteins in ovarian cancer
脉搏血氧仪：已有 50 年历史的设备得到升级50 年前用于检测血氧水平的便携式设备彻底改变了医疗领域，现在正在接受重要更新https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Pulse-oximetry-A-50-year-old-device-gets-an-upgrade.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Pulse-oximetry-A-50-year-old-device-gets-an-upgrade.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb4f3ccb-a16f-4f82-870c-bd6bced407e5 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 20:31:54 -0400 Pulse oximetry: A 50-year-old device gets an upgrade
对于头晕患者，MRI 可能比 CT 联合 CTA 更有效根据《美国伦琴学杂志》(AJR) 上发表的一份已接受的手稿，仅接受 CT 和 CTA 后从急诊室 (ED) 出院的患者可能会受益于替代或额外的 MRI 评估，包括使用专门的简化方案进行该模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/MRI-may-be-more-efficient-than-CT-with-CTA-in-病人-with-dizziness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/MRI-may-be-more- effective-than-CT-with-CTA-in-病人-with-dizziness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc2225dc-6973-462d-b5a5-6a557e5ad71f Fri, 07 Jul 2023 20:24:50 -0400 MRI may be more effective than CT with CTA in patients with dizziness
